trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter" /> and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave" /> events of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> object and the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave" />, <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select" />, and <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect" /> events of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave" /> 事件的数据以及 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 对象的 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave" />、<see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select" /> 和 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect" /> 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect?displayProperty=fullName>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave?displayProperty=fullName>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerNode`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control to which the selection has moved.
trans-unit.target: 获取选定内容移动到的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control to which the selection has moved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" />控制转移到所选内容已移动。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control from which the selection has moved.
trans-unit.target: 获取从其移动选定内容的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control from which the selection has moved.
Gets the reason why the selection has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取选定内容更改的原因。

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected text, including the XML elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取所选文本，包括 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Selection" /> that includes the text and XML elements; <see langword="null" /> if no text is selected.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Selection" /> ，包括文本和 XML 元素，则<see langword="null" />如果未不选定任何文本。
